column4: Dabill:  to be honest  there is hardly anything worth upgrading from Hardy to Intrepid Ibex
I didn't expect anything much from intrepid but i wanted to upgrade, cuz Hardy was buggy, my wifi wouldn't work
my sound from my laptop is working again in Ibex, working like NEVER BEFORE
well that's  nice  my GDM  does not  display right, but oh well just GDM,  but at times it would in hady display right on this PC
well consdiering I am a touch typeist it is usauley faster to type them
so am i, but using tab is way faster.
and avoids typos
mozilla seamonkey I guess
Kompozer was based on NVU  and well they both are based on Mozilla Seamonkey's  compossor  so yeah
or the former Mozilla Suite's to be exact,  but yes  Seamonkey  in answer to your question
so, if I don't want to download the klibs.. I can use seamonkey?
wrong person ;)
isn't rhythmbox better than banshee? which is less prone to crash?
I used to use Rythombox in Hardy Heron when Banshee sucked
,but now  Banshee kicks arse  big time compared to Rythombox
thanks, I'll get banshee soon! amarok isn't native to gnome, right?
indeed it's not native to Gnome  since it's a KDE app, but it will run in Gnome/Ubuntu
yeah you need Intrepid Ibex  for good version of Banshee, or  do the ppa in Hardy Heron
I like rhythmbox's easy search. and it'll play the songs in the filter.. I don't like making playlists.
playlists heh, just import  your music to banshee and videos, and that's that
and last.fm is cool to use with Banshee :)  http://www.last.fm
PIdgin could be used for IRC yes, but Konversation :d
